snippet: Bobby Vee still has the infectious smile, bright eyes and boyish good looks of his 1960s pop idol days, when he scored such hits as "Take Good Care of My Baby," ''Rubber Ball" and "The Night Has a Thousand Eyes."...

headline.print_headline: Bobby Vee Braves Alzheimer's to Record Once More
headline.main: Bobby Vee Braves Alzheimer's to Record Once More

lead_paragraph: Bobby Vee still has the infectious smile, bright eyes and boyish good looks of his 1960s pop idol days, when he scored such hits as "Take Good Care of My Baby," ''Rubber Ball" and "The Night Has a Thousand Eyes."
